title: Moxie Spot for Jeremy Larson Concert
body: We were asked by the event coordinators for tonight's Jeremy Larson concert (04.10.07) if we'd like to make a short segment about The Moxie. We jumped on the opportunity, and threw it together in one day, which is kind of obvious. Either way, we had fun doing it, AND you get to hear the brand new Moxie theme song.
credits:
• Talking HeadDan Chilton
  • DirectorJustin Glow
  • Theme SongJ.R. Top
